text: 'To this True World, as you call it, we come to die,' Lily-yo said, doubtingly. The. Captive with the fleshless jaw said, 'The grub of the tigerfly thinks it dies when it changes into a tigerfly.' 'You are still young,' said the Chief Captive. 'You begin. newly here. Where are your souls?' Lily-yo and Flor looked at each other. In their fight from the 4wiltmilt they had heedlessly thrown down their souls.
